description: Try our easy to follow Orange & Soy Chicken With Simple Fried Rice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Orange & Soy Chicken With Simple Fried Rice
name: Orange & Soy Chicken With Simple Fried Rice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Slice chicken. Serve buk choy topped with fried rice and chicken. Slice remaining orange. Garnish with coriander and orange slices.
